data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Cox‘S Bazar, Chittagong, Bangladesh to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Cox‘S Bazar, Chittagong, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Cox‘S Bazar, Chittagong, Bangladesh.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the county of Cox'S Bazar.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Cox‘S Bazar, Chittagong, Bangladesh so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jharudar people. Make the Jharudar people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Cox‘S Bazar, Chittagong, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Cox‘S Bazar, Chittagong, Bangladesh to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.section_summary:
the county of Cox‘S Bazar, Chittagong, Bangladesh has a population of 2,290,000.

We estimate Cox'S Bazar has 2,869 people who might know Jesus, 6,870 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,280,261 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Cox‘S Bazar, Chittagong, Bangladesh.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.
